metadata.title: CVE-2024-8394 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Undergoing Certification (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: When aborting the verification of an OTR chat session, an attacker couldhave caused a use-after-free bug leading to a potentially exploitablecrash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 128.2.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
